attributes.family: '''Deziel Dalt''' is a minor character that debuts in "Two Swords". He is a landed knight and the head of House Dalt, a vassal house sworn to House Martell of Dorne.==Biography==Deziel Dalt is the Knight of Lemonwood.===Season 4===Ser Deziel is a member of the group of Dornish lords and knights and that accompany Prince Oberyn Martell to King's Landing.==Appearances==Season Four Appearances
attributes.title: File:Dalt mini shield.png

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Deziel Dalt is one of the many Dornish nobles that escort Prince Oberyn to [[King's Landing]].
sections.Biography:
Deziel Dalt is the Knight of [[Lemonwood]].
===[[Season 4]]===
Ser Deziel is a member of the group of [[Dornish]] lords and knights and that accompany Prince [[Oberyn Martell]] to [[King's Landing]].
